title: Flashy 101 🔥
description: Some tips and tricks to help you get started!

cards.answer: The best way to study and share flashcards!

cards.prompt: To edit a deck, tap the red arrow button in the bottom right corner, and then click the yellow 'edit' icon.
cards.answer: Nice! 👏🏼 Now you can add, remove, and edit cards.
You can also edit the title and description from here. You can even toggle your deck to public, so others can learn from your flashcards too! 🌎

cards.prompt: Want to check out what others have created? Visit the **Explore** page
cards.answer: Once you find a deck you like, click the copy button to add it to your library!

### This means that:  
* You can add bulleted lists  
* Like this!
  
```print('Or add <code /> blocks, like this!')```
  
And more!   

You can even add photos!
  
![image of doge](https://media.giphy.com/media/HCTfYH2Xk5yw/giphy.gif)
Just click the blue save button in the bottom right corner.
Just click the red arrow button again, and then click the green 'start' button. ▶️
